title: The effect of oxygen on NiO as a back buffer layer in CdTe solar cells
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1746-1753
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00125G, Paper

Nicholas Hunwick, Xiaolei Liu, Mustafa Togay, John M. Walls, Jake Bowers, Patrick J. M. Isherwood
Oxygen content during sputtering affects the characteristics of nickel oxide and was studied as a back buffer layer in cadmium telluride solar cells. Simulated valence band offsets outline ideal value range and are compared to measurements.
